job_description: Analyze business data, create dashboards, and support reporting requirements.
Work with business teams to gather requirements and analyze processes.
Support analytics-driven consulting engagements and client presentations.
Prepare reports and assist senior analysts with data analysis tasks.
Analyze datasets and build dashboards for internal stakeholders.
Create BI dashboards and provide insights for business growth.
Support consulting teams with analytics and reporting.
Analyze customer and operational data to support decision-making.
Generate operational reports and track KPIs.
Assist in business analysis and documentation activities.
Analyze large datasets to support product and operations teams.
Deliver analytics insights to consulting clients.
Support analytics for fintech operations and growth.
Analyze healthcare and business data for consulting projects.
Analyze payment data and build insights for product teams.
